name: SOS GLOBAL EXPRESS
sampleDescriptions: Support efforts to ensure small and mid-sized freight-forwarders are able to ship commerce safely, including video equipment used by broadcasters.

Support efforts to ensure small and mid-sized freight-forwarders are able to ship commerce safely, including video equipment used by broadcasters.
Support efforts to ensure small and mid-sized freight-forwarders are able to ship commerce safely, including video equipment used by broadcasters.
Support policies and regulations allowing for the safe transport of broadcast equipment, and ensure that air cargo safety policies do not discriminate against small or medium sized shippers.
